pages.text: Allows the replication of AC liquids with a special cauldron with special methods (with compatibility with create's fluid piping system)
pages.title: Liquid Replication

pages.text: Right click a normal Cauldron while sneaking with a Metal Block in hand
Place an Acidic Radrock on top of the Metal Cauldron
Right click with a Soda Bottle to be able to bucket it freely
